Name: NEKO PAPALA
About the game: ※All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.※ Brief： “NEKO PAPALA” is Matsuri Studio’s first self-made adult game which integrate “Music Rhythm” and “Erotic Education Simulation”. Player acts a guy who loves music. One day, he finds 4 abandoned cats and brings them home. Player needs to get scores by playing music and then you will receive items to feed or interact with cats. After taking wonderful care of these cats, their “gratitude” will be growing. Until they’re satisfied, they will become lovely and sexy kitty maids to repay. How will they repay? Of course is their youthful body! Let’s cherish these lovely kitty maids. Features: ◇ Enjoy bashful repaying from flirty kitty maids. ◇ Album lets you review your sexy kitty maids whenever you want. ◇ 16:9 high quality pictures make you feast your eyes on kitty maids’ youthful body. ◇ There are 12 Japanese songs from famous music website 「魔王魂」 make you enjoy an unique rhythm game fun. Summary: The main role is a college guy who loves music. One day, he goes to a convenient store at midnight since he is very starving. Suddenly, he finds 4 abandoned poor cats in a shabby box on his way home. Looking at their big round eyes, he feels compassion for these lovely kitties and decides to bring them home. He tries to feed these kitties after he arrives home, but no matter what he tries, they still looks uninterested and ill. “Maybe they are tired.” he thinks so he settles them on a warm bed and keeps composing his new work. When he is playing his music, he finds 4 cats are getting more and more energetic. The faster he plays, the better they are. And the moment of music over, one of these cats is glowing with a strong bright light and after the dazzling light disappeared, he is numb by what he is seeing. There is an adorable girl with a pair of lovely cat ears stands in front of him!!! The kitty maid smiles at him and calls him “Master”. In order to thank the master of picking them up, she wants to well repay the guy. Then, the kitty maid takes off her clothes revealing her fair skin and slowly takes off his pants…. More exciting content, just enjoy the game. We are not going to spoil it. About Us: “Matsuri Studio”is a newly established Taiwan-based game development team. All of us love to make games which can satisfy player’s requirement and inspire players' desire. Hope you can support local developing teams. Your support is our great motivation. Description of adult content: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content. It contains content that is not for all ages, such as partial nudity, sexual themes, and intense language. All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
Publishers: Revere Heaven Love People Innovation Technology Co., Ltd.
